mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.raterby_id AS "raterbyId", a.base_score AS "baseScore", a.second_score AS "secondScore", a.third_score AS "thirdScore", a.fake_score AS "fakeScore", a.bear_score AS "bearScore", a.bear_rate AS "bearRate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.note1 AS "note1", a.note2 AS "note2", u2.name AS "raterby.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.raterby_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_summary_total( id, raterby_id, base_score, second_score, third_score, fake_score, bear_score, bear_rate, create_date, note1, note2 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{raterbyId}, #{baseScore}, #{secondScore}, #{thirdScore}, #{fakeScore}, #{bearScore}, #{bearRate}, #{createDate}, #{note1}, #{note2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pj_summary_total SET raterby_id = #{raterbyId}, base_score = #{baseScore}, second_score = #{secondScore}, third_score = #{thirdScore}, fake_score = #{fakeScore}, bear_score = #{bearScore}, bear_rate = #{bearRate}, note1 = #{note1}, note2 = #{note2} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.raterby_id,a.base_score,a.second_score, a.third_score,a.fake_score,a.bear_score,a.bear_rate, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-01') as 'create_date', u.`name` as 'raterby_name' from pj_summary_total a LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.raterby_id=u.id where raterby_id=#{raterbyId} and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-01')=DATE_FORMAT(#{createDate},'%Y-%m-01')

SELECT a.raterby_id,avg(a.base_score) 'base_score',avg(a.second_score) 'second_score', avg(a.third_score)'third_score',avg(a.fake_score) 'fake_score',avg(a.bear_score) 'bear_score', avg(a.bear_rate) 'bear_rate',u.`name` as 'raterby_name' from pj_summary_total a LEFT JOIN sys_user u on a.raterby_id=u.id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-01')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate},'%Y-%m-01')
and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-01')>=DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-01')
GROUP BY a.raterby_id
